entry.title: Voigtl√§nder 15mm f/4.5 Super Wide Heliar: A portrait of a lens
entry.summary: Super-wide Heliar was the first M Mount lens I bought. I have used it extensively, in particular on my Olympus E-P2.

div.p: Super-wide Heliar was the first M Mount lens I bought. I have used it extensively, in particular on my Olympus E-P2.
